languages.text: {n}Вы стараетесь найти... что-то, что привлечет ваше внимание. Но мерцающие руны выглядят... одинаково.{/n}
{n}You try looking for... something, anything, that catches your attention. But the flickering runes... all look the same.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы стараетесь найти... что-то, что привлечет ваше внимание. Но мерцающие руны выглядят... одинаково.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You try looking for... something, anything, that would catch your attention. But the flickering runes... all look the same.{/n}
{n}You try looking for... something, anything, that would catch your attention. But the flickering runes... all look the same.{/n}
{n}You try looking for... something, anything, that would catch your attention. But the flickering runes... all look the same.{/n}
{n}You try looking for... something, anything, that would catch your attention. But the flickering runes... all look the same.{/n}
{n}You try looking for... something, anything, that catches your attention. But the flickering runes... all look the same.{/n}
{n}You try looking for... something, anything, that catches your attention. But the flickering runes... all look the same.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは探そうとする…何かを。自分の注意を引く何かを。しかしチラチラと瞬くルーンには…何も変わった様子はない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try looking for... something, anything, that catches your attention. But the flickering runes... all look the same.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは探そうとする…何かを。自分の注意を引く何かを。しかしチラチラと瞬くルーンには…何も変わった様子はない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你试着寻找……任何能引起你注意的东西，但屏幕上那些闪烁的文字……看起来全都一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try looking for... something, anything, that catches your attention. But the flickering runes... all look the same.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你试着寻找……任何能引起你注意的东西，但屏幕上那些闪烁的文字……看起来全都一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du suchst ... etwas, irgendetwas, das deine Aufmerksamkeit erregt. Aber die flackernden Runen ... sehen alle gleich aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try looking for... something, anything, that catches your attention. But the flickering runes... all look the same.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du suchst ... etwas, irgendetwas, das deine Aufmerksamkeit erregt. Aber die flackernden Runen ... sehen alle gleich aus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous cherchez désespérément à repérer... quelque chose, n'importe quoi qui soit susceptible d'attirer votre attention, mais les runes clignotantes se ressemblent toutes pour votre regard non-initié.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try looking for... something, anything, that catches your attention. But the flickering runes... all look the same.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous cherchez désespérément à repérer... quelque chose, n'importe quoi qui soit susceptible d'attirer votre attention, mais les runes clignotantes se ressemblent toutes pour votre regard non-initié.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Intentas buscar... algo, lo que sea, cualquier cosa que capte tu atención. Pero todas las runas parpadeantes te parecen iguales.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try looking for... something, anything, that catches your attention. But the flickering runes... all look the same.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Intentas buscar... algo, lo que sea, cualquier cosa que capte tu atención. Pero todas las runas parpadeantes te parecen iguales.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dikkatini çeken bir şey, herhangi bir şey görmeye çalışıyorsun ancak yanıp sönen rünlerin hepsi de birbirine benziyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try looking for... something, anything, that catches your attention. But the flickering runes... all look the same.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dikkatini çeken bir şey, herhangi bir şey görmeye çalışıyorsun ancak yanıp sönen rünlerin hepsi de birbirine benziyor.{/n}
